snippet: In this special edition of the SNY.tv Metro Hockey Podcast, Christopher Botta, Pierre McGuire of NBC and Adam Rotter of SNYRangersBlog.com discuss all things Rangers.
abstract: In this special edition of the SNY.tv Metro Hockey Podcast, Christopher Botta, Pierre McGuire of NBC and Adam Rotter of SNYRangersBlog.com discuss all things Rangers.

headline.main: Listen: SNY.tv Metro Hockey Podcast, Rangers Edition
